title: Upstream GCC broken for --target=pdp11-aout
body:
Hi!

Testing revealed that a rust-enabled upstream GCC build (at g:06ca0c9abb260266b688e2c2154c72214bb47076) for --target=pdp11-aout breaks:
```
../gcc/configure '--with-pkgversion=basepoints/gcc-13-5954-g06ca0c9abb2, built at 1676413490' --prefix=/var/lib/laminar/run/gcc-pdp11-aout/57/toolchain-install --enable-werror-always --enable-languages=all --disable-gcov --disable-shared --disable-threads --target=pdp11-aout --without-headers
[...]
make V=1 all-gcc
[...]
[all 2023-02-15 01:32:13] /usr/lib/gcc-snapshot/bin/g++  -fno-PIE -c  -DIN_GCC_FRONTEND -g -O2   -DIN_GCC  -DCROSS_DIRECTORY_STRUCTURE   -fno-exceptions -fno-rtti -fasynchronous-unwind-tables -W -Wall -Wno-narrowing -Wwrite-strings -Wcast-qual -Wmissing-format-attribute -Wconditionally-supported -Woverloaded-virtual -pedantic -Wno-long-long -Wno-variadic-macros -Wno-overlength-strings -Werror -Wno-unused-parameter -fno-common  -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -Irust -I../../gcc/gcc -I../../gcc/gcc/rust -I../../gcc/gcc/../include  -I../../gcc/gcc/../libcpp/include -I../../gcc/gcc/../libcody  -I../../gcc/gcc/../libdecnumber -I../../gcc/gcc/../libdecnumber/dpd -I../libdecnumber -I../../gcc/gcc/../libbacktrace   -o rust/rust-tree.o -MT rust/rust-tree.o -MMD -MP -MF rust/
.deps/rust-tree.TPo -g -O2   -I ../../gcc/gcc/rust -I ../../gcc/gcc/rust/lex -I ../../gcc/gcc/rust/parse -I ../../gcc/gcc/rust/ast -I ../../gcc/gcc/rust/analysis -I ../../gcc/gcc/rust/backend -I ../../gcc/gcc/rust/expand -I ../../gcc/gcc/rust/hir/tree -I ../../gcc/gcc/rust/hir -I ../../gcc/gcc/rust/resolve -I ../../gcc/gcc/rust/util -I ../../gcc/gcc/rust/typecheck -I ../../gcc/gcc/rust/checks/lints -I ../../gcc/gcc/rust/checks/errors -I ../../gcc/gcc/rust/checks/errors/privacy -I ../../gcc/gcc/rust/util -I../../gcc/gcc/rust/metadata ../../gcc/gcc/rust/backend/rust-tree.cc
[all 2023-02-15 01:32:16] In file included from ./tm.h:18,
[all 2023-02-15 01:32:16]                  from ../../gcc/gcc/target.h:52,
[all 2023-02-15 01:32:16]                  from ../../gcc/gcc/rust/backend/rust-tree.cc:34:
[all 2023-02-15 01:32:16] ../../gcc/gcc/rust/backend/rust-tree.cc: In function 'void Rust::mark_exp_read(tree)':
[all 2023-02-15 01:32:16] ../../gcc/gcc/config/pdp11/pdp11.h:572:3: error: 'pdp11_gen_int_label' was not declared in this scope
[all 2023-02-15 01:32:16]   572 |   pdp11_gen_int_label ((LABEL), (PREFIX), (NUM))
[all 2023-02-15 01:32:16]       |   ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[all 2023-02-15 01:32:16] ../../gcc/gcc/rust/backend/rust-tree.cc:53:3: note: in expansion of macro 'ASM_GENERATE_INTERNAL_LABEL'
[all 2023-02-15 01:32:16]    53 |   ASM_GENERATE_INTERNAL_LABEL (tmp_name, "Lsrc_loc", 1);
[all 2023-02-15 01:32:16]       |   ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[all 2023-02-15 01:32:17] ../../gcc/gcc/rust/backend/rust-tree.cc: In function 'tree_node* Rust::fold_builtin_source_location(location_t)':
[all 2023-02-15 01:32:17] ../../gcc/gcc/config/pdp11/pdp11.h:572:3: error: 'pdp11_gen_int_label' was not declared in this scope
[all 2023-02-15 01:32:17]   572 |   pdp11_gen_int_label ((LABEL), (PREFIX), (NUM))
[all 2023-02-15 01:32:17]       |   ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[all 2023-02-15 01:32:17] ../../gcc/gcc/rust/backend/rust-tree.cc:4799:7: note: in expansion of macro 'ASM_GENERATE_INTERNAL_LABEL'
[all 2023-02-15 01:32:17]  4799 |       ASM_GENERATE_INTERNAL_LABEL (tmp_name, "Lsrc_loc", source_location_id++);
[all 2023-02-15 01:32:17]       |       ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[all 2023-02-15 01:32:17] make[1]: *** [../../gcc/gcc/rust/Make-lang.in:367: rust/rust-tree.o] Error 1
[all 2023-02-15 01:32:17] rm m2/gm2-compiler-boot/P2Build.mod m2/gm2-compiler-boot/P0SyntaxCheck.mod m2/gm2-compiler-boot/PCBuild.mod m2/gm2-compiler-boot/PHBuild.mod m2/gm2-compiler-boot/P1Build.mod m2/gm2-compiler-boot/P3Build.mod
[all 2023-02-15 01:32:17] make[1]: Leaving directory '/var/lib/laminar/run/gcc-pdp11-aout/57/toolchain-build/gcc'
[all 2023-02-15 01:32:18] make: *** [Makefile:4618: all-gcc] Error 2
```
(Full build log at http://toolchain.lug-owl.de/laminar/log/gcc-pdp11-aout/57)

I'll bisect from the previous successful build, will take a second or two. ;-)
